original_title: DeSean Jackson: The Making of a Father's Dream
overview: Documentary, Biographical Documentaries, Sports Documentaries, Football, Sports Stories - The life story of Philadelphia Eagles wide receiver DeSean Jackson is a roadmap of the making of an elite athlete, from Pop Warner to the Pro Bowl. This story is a result of 18 years of documenting every aspect of DeSean's journey to NFL stardom and his family's struggle to stick together through it all.
title: DeSean Jackson: The Making of a Father's Dream
